column5: Looking to finally get a bimini top and enclosure done on my boat. Anyone in the Hamilton/Burlington/Caledonia/Brantford  area that you would recommend?  Thanks
These guys do great work, probably the best in this area.  http://www.eaglecanvas.ca/
Gary's Custom Marine in Cambridge.  Very happy with my travel cover, been 10 years and still in great shape.  https://plus.google.com/106776447874837586191/about?gl=ca&hl=en
